column1: The '''Old Guesthouse''' was an inn in [[Minas Tirith]]. It was located on the first tier
column2: on [[Lampwrights' Street]]. It was surrounded on three sides by a lawn
[[Peregrin Took|Pippin]] met [[Bergil]] here. The inn's fate is not known
column3: but it could have been destroyed in the [[Siege of Minas Tirith]]. <ref>{{RK|V1}}.</ref>

column1: The ''Old Guesthouse'' was known as ''Sennas Iaur'' in [[Sindarin]].<ref>[[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
column5: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: A Reader's Companion]]''
